title: A quick guide to the Smart Hub CDP
Adaptive Query Execution(AQE) in Spark 3.0
description: Spark 3.0 released while ago. A bunch of new features are added in this new version of spark. One of the interesting features added is Adaptive Query Execution. Let’s look into AQE optimizations in this post. Dynamic Join Strategy Handling Skew Data Adaptive shuffle partitions Let’s look into each feature in detail. Dynamic Join Strategy: […]

title: Rohit Talwar shares his Vision for a Post-pandemic Future
Trivago Tech Week
description:
One of my favorite events throughout the year is the trivago tech get together. It’s the one time where we all get together to celebrate tech. Here are some impressions from 2019:
See all those happy people mingling in person? Guess it’s obvious why we had to change this up for 2020.
Why internal conferences are still important We managed to get a lot done this year, but communication across teams was getting harder through virtual meetings.
